attributes.action: Parents to make their own decision to keep their children off school
attributes.additional_details:
After Boris’s speech, confirming that many of “our relatives will die before their time “ 
And then end it with “wash your hands” 
Has worried some of the public even more and us as parents should be able to make our own choices on how we protect our children.
attributes.background:
I would like the government to allow parents to be able make their own choice whether to home education on a temporary basis, before the schools officially go on lockdown.

Therefore patents still wanting their children in schools can still attend.
